# Educational Design Checklist

- [ ] Outcomes are **measurable** and use Bloom action verbs
- [ ] Prerequisites stated; progression scaffolds prior knowledge
- [ ] Activities mix: **Explain → Example → Exercise → Feedback**
- [ ] Cognitive Load managed (chunking, signaling, modality)
- [ ] Timeboxing and pacing defined per activity
- [ ] Multimodal resources (text, diagram, demo, quiz)
- [ ] Inclusivity & accessibility considered
- [ ] Assessments aligned to outcomes and practice
- [ ] Feedback loops defined (formative + summative)
- [ ] References & further learning provided
